summary: Don't want Ysolda constantly reminding you of your debt to her? this will fix that right up!
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description:
[/b]If you chose to persuade Ysolda during the quest "A night to remember" she will during and after the quest remind you of your unpaid debt. this mod simply removes this dialogue line from her.
[b]
Installation:
J[/b]ust put the file into your data folder and activate it.
Or if using the mod manager just activate it.
[b]
Compatability[/b]
( in the case of the Always version)
Mods that require this line to activate a quest or other action will not work with this as this mod doesn't allow the line to be said.

[b]Versions:
[/b]No more debt - Always: this prevents the "You still owe me" line from being uttered by Ysolda
No more debt - Marriage: this prevents the "You still owe me" line from being uttered by Ysolda when you're married to her.
author: Arthanias
